Purpose (EN): Complete protein for muscle building and recovery
Who Needs It: Anyone struggling to hit protein goals
Safety Notes (EN): Generally safe. Check for lactose intolerance.
Safety Notes (AR): آمن عموماً. تحقق من حساسية اللاكتوز.

Purpose (EN): Increases strength power and muscle mass

Who Needs It: Most people especially in Saudi Arabia
Safety Notes (EN): Get blood test to check levels first.
Safety Notes (AR): احصل على فحص دم للمستويات أولاً.

Who Needs It: Everyone not eating fatty fish regularly
Safety Notes (EN): Choose quality brand to avoid contaminants.

Safety Notes (AR): لا تتجاوز 400 ملجم/يوم. تجنبه بعد الساعة 2.

Purpose (EN): Zinc magnesium for recovery and sleep
Who Needs It: Those with poor sleep or recovery

Purpose (EN): Reduces muscle fatigue during high-rep training
Purpose (AR): يقلل إرهاق العضلات خلال التكرارات العالية
Who Needs It: Those doing high-rep or endurance training

Purpose (EN): Better pumps blood flow and endurance
Who Needs It: Those wanting better pumps and performance
Safety Notes (EN): Very safe. No major side effects.
Safety Notes (AR): آمن جداً. لا آثار جانبية كبيرة.

Purpose (AR): الحفاظ على العضلات خلال التمرين صائماً
Safety Notes (EN): Unnecessary if eating protein around workout.
Safety Notes (AR): غير ضروري إذا تأكل بروتين حول التمرين.

Purpose (EN): Convenient protein snack on the go
Safety Notes (EN): Check sugar content. Some are candy bars.
Safety Notes (AR): تحقق من محتوى السكر. بعضها ألواح حلوى.
